events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position, and our team will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your skills and experience.
A recruiter from our Engineering hiring team has been assigned to guide you through the next stages of the process.
We completed the initial screening interview where we discussed your background and technical skills in detail.
You responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm for moving forward with the technical interview process.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 6th, where you will be assessed on software development skills.
You successfully completed the technical interview with positive feedback regarding your problem-solving abilities.
We arranged an HR interview to discuss company culture and benefits, scheduled for May 9th.
You completed the HR interview with a good impression on our team concerning alignment with our company values.
An offer has been extended for the Software Engineer role, including salary, benefits, and starting date details.
You have provided positive feedback about the offer and expressed excitement about joining the team soon.
You formally accepted the job offer, and we are preparing to begin the onboarding process shortly.
Your onboarding process has started, including account setup, orientation sessions, and team introductions.
The hiring process has been successfully completed, and you are now officially part of our Engineering team.
